card.def: Dad gets up at six, and I do also.
Can I have another glass of milk?
I will ask Mom if I can go.
I hope to be a teacher one day.
I have to rush because I am late.
It has been nice to see you.
I will go to the lake, but I will not swim.
What did you buy at the store?
Call me if you will be late.
A baby bear is called a cub.
Does the bat fit in the bag?
I do not even need to rush.
Try not to fall on the ice.
The sun is far off in space.
Did you find it on the map?
It is the first day of school.
I found the hat I had lost.
The park is not far from here.
I will go with you if you like.
Did you wait for a long time?
Many hats can fit in the box.
There is no milk in the glass.
I will sit at the other table.
I saw it with my own eyes.
The ending was part of the story.
There are a lot of people in the room.
You can pick a game to play.
This is a nice place for a picnic.
I put my hand in my pocket.
The teacher will read to the class.
I like to run on the track.
I will show you the dance steps.
The nail made a small hole in the wall.
Wear a raincoat so you won't get wet.
Did you thank your friend for the book?
Did you pack your things for school?
It is hard to see through the fog.
My cat likes to nap in the sun.
Eve and I sit together on the bus.
Dad used a ladder to paint the ceiling.
It is very hot in the sun.
Will we walk or take the bus?
Do you want to walk with me?
Is this the right way to go?
We were tired at the end of the day.
I know the words to the song.
